Package me.itzloghotxd.pdk.config

Class ConfigManager

java.lang.Object
me.itzloghotxd.pdk.config.ConfigManager
public class ConfigManager extends Object
Manages multiple configuration files by mapping them to an Enum type. This class provides utility functions to save, reload, and retrieve configurations efficiently.
Author:
ItzLoghotXD

    • getFile

      public ConfigHandler getFile​(Enum<?> type)
      Retrieves a registered configuration file by its associated Enum type.
      Parameters:
      type - The Enum key associated with the configuration file.
      Returns:
      The corresponding ConfigHandler instance.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the configuration file is not registered.

    • registerFile

      public void registerFile​(Enum<?> type, ConfigHandler config)
      Registers a configuration file in the manager.
      Parameters:
      type - The Enum key used to identify this configuration file.
      config - The ConfigHandler instance to associate with the given key.

    • saveDefault

      public void saveDefault()
      Saves the default configuration files if it does not already exist.

    • hasConfig

      public boolean hasConfig​(Enum<?> type)
      Checks if a configuration file is registered.
      Parameters:
      type - The Enum key associated with the configuration file.
      Returns:
      True if the configuration file is registered, false otherwise.

    • getFileConfiguration

      public org.bukkit.configuration.file.FileConfiguration getFileConfiguration​(File file)
      Loads a configuration file into a FileConfiguration object.
      Parameters:
      file - The file to load the configuration from.
      Returns:
      A FileConfiguration instance containing the loaded data.

    • getConfig

      public org.bukkit.configuration.file.FileConfiguration getConfig​(Enum<?> type)
      Retrieves the FileConfiguration associated with a registered configuration file.
      Parameters:
      type - The Enum key associated with the configuration file.
      Returns:
      The FileConfiguration instance.

    • getConfigurations

      public Map<Enum<?>,​ConfigHandler> getConfigurations()
      Retrieves a map of all registered configurations.
      Returns:
      A Map containing all registered ConfigHandler instances.
